軹字的基本解释

軹
zhǐ
见“轵”。

軹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǐ］
［《廣韻》諸氏切，上紙，章。］
“轵1”的繁体字。
(1)车毂外端贯穿车轴的细孔。
(2)车轴头。
(3)车两輢横直交结之木。
(4)古县名。在今河南省济源县。
(5)通“枳”。歧。
(6)通“枝”。
(7)通“只”。语气词。

軹字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　軹； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1242第15
【廣韻】【正韻】諸氏切【集韻】【韻會】掌氏切，?音紙。【說文】車輪小穿。【釋名】軹，指也。如指而見于轂頭也。【周禮·夏官·大馭】祭兩軹。【註】軹，謂轊頭也。　又縣名。【史記·漢高祖紀】秦王子嬰降軹道旁。　又岐也。【爾雅·釋地】北方有軹首蛇。【註】岐頭蛇也。　又語辭。【莊子·大宗師】許由曰：而奚來爲軹。【註】軹、只同。　又藥名。【本草】連翹。一名軹。

Zhe
Basic explanation of words
Zhe

Zhe
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhǐ］
["Guang Yun" cut by all the clan, put on paper, chapter. ]
Traditional characters for "轵1".
(1) The outer end of the hub passes through the fine hole of the axle.
(2) Axle head.
(3) The two cars hang horizontally and cross the knotted wood.
(4) The name of the ancient county. In today's Jiyuan County, Henan Province.
(5) Through "trifoliate". Divergence.
(6) Through "branch".
(7) Pass "only". Modal.
Zhe
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　轵; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1242 No. 15
【Guang Yun】【Zheng Yun】Zhu Shi cut 【Ji Yun】【Yun Hui】Zhang Shi cut, sound paper. [Said the text] The wheels are small. 【Release name】Zhe, also means. See also in the hub head as indicated. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Dayu】Memorial to Liangzhe. 【Note】Zhe, that is, the head is also.　Also the county name. 【Historical Records·Han Gaozu Ji】Qin Wang Ziying next to the road.　You Qi also. 【Erya·Shidi】There are snakehead snakes in the north. [Note] Qi head snake also.　 Another word. [Zhuangzi·Grand Master] Xu Youyue: And Xi Lai is Zhe. 【Note】Zhe, only the same.　Also the name of the medicine. 【Materia Medica】Forsythia. One Zhe.
